name: Rüzgar Bodurlopu
desc:
A small monster created by the coalescing of Anemo dispersed throughout nature.
It is able to float in the air to a certain degree due to the power of Anemo.

dropMaterial.name: Bodurlop Özü
dropMaterial.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

dropMaterial.name: Bodurlop Salgıları
dropMaterial.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

dropMaterial.name: Yoğun Bodurlop Özü
dropMaterial.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.
